Text: Boils berries into jam for further processing.
The pot had to be closed up after too many sweet-toothed beavers have been tempted by the delicious jam.
A fresh and nutritious apple from the orchard
Produces alcoholic beverages from various ingredients.
A place where beavers transform simple crops into spirits, bringing both joy and caution to the settlement.
A versatile grain that grows in wet conditions
A spirit that brings joy in moderation
The need for entertainment and enjoyment.
